name: The Adventures of Dash: A 2D platform and puzzle adventure!
blurb: Puzzle and platform your way through this rip-roaring side scrolling 2D adventure with a narcoleptic boy named Dash!

rewards.reward: Digital copy of The Adventures of Dash (DRM-Free) plus a digital copy of The Adventures of Dash soundtrack by Danny Baranowsky.

Digital copy of the game, soundtrack by Danny Baranowsky and HD digital downloads of Project: Robotoki - a feature length documentary delivered episodically chronicling the building of Robotoki over its first two years, the development of our games including The Adventures of Dash and the upcoming Human Element. \r\nINCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS + Free downloads of all future DLC and Expansions of the digital version of The Adventures of Dash included in your previous rewards. Any new Dream Worlds, Awake World expansions, and playable in-game arcade cabinets added to the game post launch. Kickstarter Backer Exclusive.

Digital copies of the game, soundtrack by Danny Baranowsky, HD documentary, a special thanks in the game's credits and a digital strategy guide containing tips, tricks, puzzle solutions, exclusive concept artwork, behind the scenes photos, and authentic 90's video game advertisement recreations.\r\nINCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS + \r\nExclusive early access to the beta of Human Element on PC - the next-gen first person survival game from Robotoki. Create your character, play test, and provide direct feedback on the development of the game before anyone else. Plus, access to early builds of The Adventures of Dash.

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS +\r\nLimited Edition The Adventures of Dash vinyl mini 10-DOH! Figure created exclusively for Kickstarter backers, 5x5 art print, and dream character cut-out figures capable of free standing.
ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS +\r\nAn in-game NPC in the awake world designed to look like you (or someone of your choosing) with it's own puzzle quest which you can help design!

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS +\r\nThe Adventures of Dash Trilogy Collectors Edition - a rare, complete in box, 8-bit and 16-bit inspired custom box designs, authentic game paks with custom label and digital download of the full game. Game paks for collection only, do not play actual game. Game must be downloaded digitally via provided code.

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS +\r\nHelp design an in-game arcade game based around you, or anything of your choosing (within reason), that will be playable in the Arcade located within town of The Adventures of Dash. Includes a custom in-game arcade cabinet, character and enemy design, and the world of the level with the collaboration of Robotoki level designers and character artists.

ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS +\r\nHave a statue designed for you in-game housed in a wing of the museum dedicated to you in The Adventures of Dash plus join us in real life for a day at Robotoki's studio. Tour our studio, participate in the documentary, and join us for the Launch party of The Adventures of Dash and be welcomed as a honorary member of the Robotoki team along with a special credit in the game. (Travel not included)
